amendment.description: To provide the Secretary of Agriculture with the necessary funding to effectively address the critical community facility infrastructure needs of our rural areas across the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4349 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4349 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2065) To provide the Secretary of Agriculture with the necessary funding to effectively address the critical community facility infrastructure needs of our rural areas across the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4349 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4349 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dole.
